name: Plague Marines
description: Resilient Death Guard warriors corrupted by Nurgle's pestilent gifts

global_rules.astartes_multi_action: Can perform 2 Shoot or 2 Fight actions. If 2 Shoot, at least one must be a bolt pistol, boltgun, or PSYCHIC weapon. Cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon twice in one activation
global_rules.disgustingly_resilient: Whenever an attack dice inflicts 3 or more damage, roll a D6; on a 4+, subtract 1 from that damage
global_rules.poison_mechanic: Successes with Poison weapons inflict a Poison token. Operatives with tokens take 1 damage upon activation.
